name: Connect the dots - Animals
description: Language of vocalization of the name of the animal: Spanish and English.   This game is designed for the smallest of the house to be entertained through join dots and discovering the animals that hide behind the puzzle.   The game of connect the dots is easy, through numbers and by join points in ascending order, you will discover which animal is hiding behind the puzzle. The animals have been classified into three types:  - Terrestrial animals; where through connect points we can discover the bear, worm, giraffe, lion, cat, chick, elephant, monkey, snail, horse, hippo, pig, rabbit, dog and zebra.  - Aquatic animals; where through join points we can discover the fish, the turtle, the starfish, the frog, the whale, the seahorse, the crab, the penguin, the octopus and the dolphin.  - Aerial animals; where through join dots we can discover the ladybug, the butterfly, the duck, the parrot, the bee.   This game is full of color, and thanks to the practice and dedication of our developers, you will get the child to pay attention and learn in an interactive and useful way.   More animals will be included in future updates.
